metaDescriptionProject.metaDescriptionProject: Lost Art worked with artist Emi Ueoka to create a 5 second television bumper for MTV.

metaKeywordsProject.metaKeywordsProject: Lost Art, Motion graphics, video, music video, MTV, Emi Ueoka, Animation, Design, Chris Hopkins,

content.content:
commissioned by big active, lost art worked with artist emi ueoka to create a five second television bumper for mtv using their iconic logo. the outcome was achieved by combining classic hand drawn illustration with digital animation techniques.

branding, animation


illustration—emi ueoka
animation—emi ueoka & chris hopkins
commissioned by—big active & mtv
